MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 08-NOV-2020 19:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the L8 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Nickleby Close and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:15am. Our emergency response team is currently on site carrying out investigations and the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will make every effort to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:20PM on 8th November 2020.
